content: a fun quick beginner project i designed this coffee cozy for beginners to practice crocheting the basic single_crochet stitch the pattern comes with 4 options that each create a different look while using the same stitch my hope is to help those new to crochet work on a quick project that they will get excited about and want to continue the craft these cozies are perfect for quick gifts during the holidays the coffee cozy sweater wrap fits most 8-12 oz coffee cups make the cozy and aadd hot cocoa packets with candy canes or tea with an infuser or go the coffee route and add some fun creamer packs any theme you give will be loved
